comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Eastern Boundary Stone – Then and Now (85 years later) As might be expected there are few changes in 85 years. This stone is located 100 feet southeast of the intersection of Eastern and Southern Avenues. To see a Google map with photographs of 38 of the original 40 boundary stones, and GPS coordinates, click here.   "DC East Boundary Stone (2005)" by Mark Zimmermann   "Eastern Boundary Stone (c.1920)" by E.B. Thompson
